title: A Perfect Circle - Thirteenth Step - TQMP slavetothesound
description:
Here&#039;s some dark, grinding, modern prog rock. I think they get compared to Tool a lot due to the fact that James Maynard Keenan provides the vocals, but I personally like this album a lot more than any Tool album.. I really don&#039;t like Tool at all... Anyway, this is an interesting album if your looking for something different and slightly on the mellow side. A couple of tracks I&#039;d recommend are The Noose and Pet.

Track list:
01. The Package    [0:07:40.37]
02. Weak And Powerless    [0:03:15.10]
03. The Noose    [0:04:53.13]
04. Blue    [0:04:13.50]
05. Vanishing    [0:04:51.35]
06. A Stranger    [0:03:12.25]
07. The Outsider    [0:04:06.00]
08. Crimes    [0:02:34.72]
09. The Nurse Who Loved Me    [0:04:04.58]
10. Pet    [0:04:34.25]
11. Lullaby    [0:02:01.72]
12. Gravity    [0:05:08.05]

I also have Mer de Noms and the rEmixed CD that came with aMotion if anyone is interested in them. I&#039;m sure Mer de Noms will make it to the net before too long...

Enjoy, and remember to upload all your own releases in FLAC so everyone can enjoy the original sound quality of the music!
